alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Craven; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 23 at 10:01AM EDT until September 23 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY FOR NORTHWESTERN BEAUFORT, NORTHWESTERN CRAVEN AND PITT COUNTIES... At 1001 AM EDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain and road closures due to flash flooding in Greenville. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Greenville, Washington, Winterville, Ayden, Bethel, Grifton, Stokes, Bell Arthur, Pactolus, Shelmerdine, House, Calico, Black Jack, Fort Barnwell, Bruce, Roundtree, Wilmar, Old Ford, Dowdy Ficklen Stadium and East Carolina University. Evans St, Greenville Blvd, 14th St, Charles Blvd, Fichlin Dr are closed or will soon be closed in Greenville, NC. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
